description.p: Little Big Adventure 2 is a must-have for any adventure games fan. This gem is everything its predecessor was, only better. With a top-notch story, moody music, and memorable characters it will give you a great gaming experience that will last for many hours. If you have played this game before, then you will be surprised how well it aged. If you haven't, then you are in luck - one of the best adventure games this planet has to offer is right here before you.
